translation.en: Oh, my God! No, no, no.
I would never do that because I was, like, a super-fat baby.
translation.it: Non lo direi mai, io stesso da piccolo ero grassissimo.

translation.en: -Why would I... I have no idea why? -You were a fat baby?
Yeah, I was like the Michelin man.
No, don't stop. I like hearing about what's wrong with you.
translation.it: Continua, mi piace sentire i tuoi difetti.

translation.en: No, I'm sorry. That was my only flaw. I would totally tell you more.
translation.it: Spiacente, quello era l'unico. Te ne direi ancora, se ce ne fossero.

translation.en: That was my one and only flaw,
and you somehow got it out of me, so thank you very much for that.
translation.it: e in qualche modo me lo hai fatto tirare fuori, per cui grazie.

translation.en: I totally just lied to you. I do have one more,
translation.it: Ce n'è un altro che non ti ho detto.

translation.en: and it's that I have these glow in the dark stickers
on my ceiling that have been there for the past ten years.
translation.it: attaccati al soffitto della camera da dieci anni.

translation.en: But besides that, I'm perfect, basically.
translation.it: Ma a parte quelli, sono perfetto.

translation.en: You got any dark secrets I should know about?
translation.it: Hai qualche oscuro segreto che dovrei conoscere?
Nulla che mi venga in mente.

translation.en: Just trying to be manly for you.
translation.it: Cercavo solo di fare il tosto.

translation.en: -What kinda animal would you be? -[Jamey] I think I'd be a bear,
translation.it: - Che animale vorresti essere? - Credo un orso,

translation.en: because they're like, super-cuddly but also really bad-ass,
translation.it: perché sono super teneroni, ma anche cazzuti.

translation.en: So what's your double side, then?
translation.it: E qual è la tua ambivalenza?

translation.en: Are you more than just a hot jock?
To answer your question, I don't really consider myself a jock.
translation.it: Per risponderti, non mi considero uno vero sportivo.

translation.en: I mean, yeah, I like football,
translation.it: Cioè, mi piace il football, ma

translation.en: but between you and me, I don't even like most of the guys on my team.
translation.it: detto tra noi, i miei compagni di squadra non mi stanno tanto simpatici.

translation.en: I love football 'cause every game is like a story.
translation.it: Mi piace il football perché ogni partita è come una favola.

translation.en: For a few hours there are villains and there are heroes.
translation.it: Per qualche ora ci sono buoni e cattivi.

translation.en: Every pass is a triumph, every tackle is a tragedy.
translation.it: Ogni passaggio è un trionfo, ogni placcaggio una tragedia.

translation.en: You're all hurtling downfield at this one epic goal
translation.it: Sfrecci veloce verso la goal line

translation.en: and every second matters. It's electric, you know.
translation.it: e ogni secondo conta. È elettrizzante.

translation.en: I can't go telling the rest of the team that.
translation.it: Ma non posso certo dirlo alla squadra.

translation.en: I'm the quarterback, so I got to keep their respect.
translation.it: Sono il quarterback, devo farmi rispettare.

translation.en: So, what kind of flower would you be?
Cactus. Does cactus count as a flower?
I don't think those qualify as flowers, no.
translation.it: Non credo abbia i requisiti, no.

translation.en: Like the queen flower all the other flowers are jealous of.
translation.it: Tipo la regina dei fiori che fa ingelosire tutti gli altri.

translation.en: Sorry, I guess it's kinda late.
After four hours on the phone,
I can pick your voice out of a line-up.
translation.it: riconoscerei la tua voce in mezzo a mille.
Che ne dici di una videochat, domani?

translation.en: I mean, it would be nice to see you, you know.
Well, maybe more for me than for you.
translation.it: Beh, magari più per me che per te.

translation.en: I mean, yeah, there's no reason why I shouldn't logically,
translation.it: Cioè, non c'è un motivo logico per cui non dovrei,

translation.en: Okay, great. Well, then, logically I can't wait.
translation.it: Grande. Beh, logicamente non vedo l'ora.

translation.en: Where are the Sour Patch parents?
I have no idea how we're gonna do this.
Oh, 'cause we shouldn't. It's a really bad plan.
translation.it: Perché non dovremmo. È una pessima idea.
- Cioè, il Vietnam già era meglio. - Ok.

translation.en: Hammer pants would even be better.
translation.it: Persino i pantaloni di MC Hammer sono meglio.

translation.en: Are you really buying your own ticket to homecoming?
translation.it: Compri il biglietto per il ballo?
Ovvio, chi vuoi che mi inviti?

translation.en: I really don't care who I go with, so it's all good.
translation.it: Non m'importa molto con chi andare.

translation.en: Thanks, but I think I'll pass on the pity date.
translation.it: Grazie, ma farò a meno della pietà.

translation.en: What, it's not a pity date.
You're wearing a lot less crap on your face.
translation.it: Hai molto meno stucco sulla faccia.

translation.en: -Where you going? We have free period. -Talk to Coach about trying out for track.
translation.it: Dove vai? C'è ricreazione. Voglio parlare col coach di atletica.

translation.en: You know the girls' team is like, last in the state, right?
translation.it: La squadra femminile fa schifo, lo sai?

translation.en: I know. I'm trying out for the boys' team.
I need something that's gonna stand out on my resume.
translation.it: Mi serve qualcosa da mettere nel curriculum.

translation.en: You know? I need to be like, Susan B. Anthony,
translation.it: Capito? Devo essere come Susan B. Anthony,

translation.en: standing up for women's rights, going against the grain.
One thing that does differentiate a college resume...
translation.it: Una cosa che farebbe risaltare il tuo CV
- Ti voglio bene. - Buona giornata, Daniel.

translation.en: -Say you love me. Say it! -Not today.
translation.it: - Di' che mi vuoi bene. - Non oggi.

translation.en: I don't see why she's allowed.
That's pretty much so we don't get sued.
Ain't that great? God bless America.

translation.it: Sierra, questo non serve per il CV.

translation.en: There's being a queen of the "throw shit at the wall and see what sticks" club.
translation.it: Non quanto aderire al club "Tira merda al muro e vedi se si attacca".

translation.en: So whatever you do, I do.
translation.it: Quindi, farò quel che fai tu.

translation.en: Move it! Let's go, pick it up!
You know what, I don't care if I get sued.
translation.it: Sapete una cosa? Me ne frego della causa.

translation.en: Go on, get off my track.
Why do you smell worse than normal?
You have to let me pluck your brows. I can't concentrate, staring into eyes of a sasquatch.
translation.it: Devi lasciarti fare le sopracciglia. Mi distrai, sembri uno yeti.

translation.en: most of his writing was about free will and moral--
Why don't you watch movies like normal people?
translation.it: Perché non guardi film come fanno tutti?

translation.en: Nietzsche is like a sexy German vampire.
translation.it: Nietzsche è come un vampiro tedesco sexy.

translation.en: He whines a lot, and he thinks everything is pointless.
translation.it: Si lagna parecchio e pensa che sia tutto inutile.

translation.en: Well, I am totally for Nietzsche.
You sure this is gonna work?
Answer it! You have to get it!
Do you wanna adjust the camera a little bit, maybe?
-[Sierra] Hey. Sorry about that. -[Veronica mouthing along]
You know what, I think that the connection is way off.
translation.it: Credo che la connessione sia lenta,

translation.en: The audio's not synced to the video at all.
translation.it: audio e video sono fuori sincrono.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, sorry my internet's the worst.
translation.it: Sì, scusa, la mia connessione fa schifo.

translation.en: Sorry, maybe we should try again another time?
But we're still on for the phone call tonight, right?
translation.it: La telefonata notturna è confermata, no?

translation.en: You are even more beautiful than I remember.
translation.it: Sei anche più bella di quel che ricordavo.

translation.en: Oh, my God, that was so great.
I can't believe it actually worked.
My heart's pounding, my heart's pounding!

translation.it: A meno che tu non faccia schifo.
- Mi stavi guardando male? - Sì, scusa!

translation.en: [Veronica] The Lion King is just Hamlet.
translation.it: Il Re Leone è in pratica Amleto.

translation.en: [Sierra] "To be or not to be, that is the question."
translation.it: "Essere o non essere, questo è il problema."

translation.en: -I'll have to teach you that one next. -[Veronica] I know.
translation.it: - Ti devo insegnare anche quello. - Lo so.

translation.en: I don't get A Picture of Dorian Gray.
translation.it: Il Ritratto di Dorian Gray non l'ho capito.

translation.en: Why does everyone like him if he does bitchy things?
translation.it: Perché è popolare pur essendo malvagio?

translation.en: [Sierra] It's Oscar Wilde's commentary on society.
translation.it: È una critica di Oscar Wilde alla società.

translation.en: Basically, since Dorian looks perfect, everybody thinks he is perfect,
translation.it: Dorian sembra perfetto, tutti lo pensano,

translation.en: and since they all value appearance above everything else,
translation.it: e dato che pongono l'aspetto sopra ogni altra cosa,

translation.en: he kind of ends up losing his own soul.
Stop. I can't. We need to have Hamlet. -Hamlet. -Boo!
You working out? You sound out of breath.
translation.it: Ti stai allenando? Sembri senza fiato.

translation.en: You know, I'm actually glad you called.
translation.it: Sono felice che tu mi abbia chiamato.

translation.en: I just had a question that I wanted to ask you.
translation.it: C'è una cosa che volevo chiederti.

translation.en: It's totally okay if you say no.
translation.it: Ma se non vuoi, va bene lo stesso.

translation.en: Actually, it probably won't be okay.
You know, to be honest, I think I'll die if you say no.
translation.it: Anche se penso che potrei morire.

translation.en: Would you want to go on a date with me?
I have a family thing tomorrow, but...
translation.it: Domani avrei una cosa in famiglia, ma...

translation.en: I have something that I need to clear up,
but I'll definitely get back to you.

translation.it: Sono nella merda fino al collo.

translation.en: You know when you're online, and you look at all these quotes.
translation.it: Sai quando sei online e leggi le citazioni...

translation.en: It just makes sense if you just follow your first instinct, always.
translation.it: È giusto seguire i propri istinti, sempre.

translation.en: -Oh, I mean, yeah. -Maybe that's true, but...
translation.it: - Oh, certo. - Forse è vero, ma...

translation.en: You want to put two really hot people together.
translation.it: Quindi farai incontrare i due super fighi.

translation.en: You think that's going to work out for you?

translation.it: Sì, ricordati che a lei piace Spence.

translation.en: I still gotta leave by five 'cause I gotta teach old people how to work computers
translation.it: Beh, io alle cinque ho il corso di computer per gli anziani. Tu vai pure a imbrogliare atleti.

translation.en: while you con jocks and stuff.
translation.it: Tu vai pure a imbrogliare atleti.

translation.en: Is that... that's your pretty boy?
He looks that damn good and he's a good person?
translation.it: Strafigo e anche un bravo ragazzo?

translation.en: -We gotta go. Let's go. -What, go where? No, no, wait.
Why are we leaving? He don't even know what you look like.
translation.it: Ma perché? Non sa neanche come sei fatta!

translation.en: He knows what I sound like, okay? He could pick my voice out of a line-up.
translation.it: Ma conosce la mia voce, ok? Potrebbe riconoscermi in mezzo a mille.

translation.en: "Pick my voice out of a line-up"? Oh, wow.
Sierra, get up. Get off the floor.
-I'm good. -You got room for two more?
translation.it: - Certo. - C'è posto per altri due?

translation.en: It's actually for community service. It looks good on college applications.
translation.it: È per il servizio civile, fa curriculum per il college.

translation.en: You guys are not going to believe this, but this is my brother, Ty,
translation.it: Non ci crederete, ma questo è mio fratello Ty,

translation.en: What are the odds of that?
It's crazy. I'm gonna make him the first four-foot quarterback.
translation.it: Davvero. Lo farò diventare il primo quarterback alto un metro e venti.

translation.en: Usually, when I introduce him, people start talking really loud,
translation.it: In genere, quando lo presento, la gente comincia a urlare,

translation.en: -and it's really annoying. -We go through that, too.
translation.it: - e questo lo infastidisce. - Succede anche a noi.

translation.en: This is my sister, Sierra. She's adopted, of course,
translation.it: Questa è mia sorella, Sierra. Adottiva, naturalmente,

translation.en: but she's deaf also, as we know.
So she can't hear anything that I say
translation.it: Non sente nulla di quel che dico,

translation.en: even if I say something like,
Which she isn't, she's not a hermaphrodite at all.
translation.it: Che ovviamente non è, per essere chiari.

translation.en: I only know that because she's been slutting it up lately.
translation.it: Lo so perché ultimamente ha troieggiato un po', diciamo.

translation.en: But the important thing is that she's a very caring person.
translation.it: Ma la cosa importante è che è una persona premurosa.

translation.en: Yeah, it's really nice to meet you, Sierra?
All right, okay. We're going to go.
So great meeting you. You too, Ty.
translation.it: È stato un vero piacere. Ciao, Ty.

translation.en: She has to go to tutor cheerleaders.
translation.it: Deve andare a fare la tutor per le cheerleader.

translation.en: -That's not okay. What just happened... -I don't care.
translation.it: - Non è giusto, non possiamo... - Non m'importa.

translation.en: ...you have to tell him the truth.
That was the dumbest shit I've seen.
translation.it: È la cosa più stupida mai vista.

translation.en: That was just reckless. Why would you be so reckless?
translation.it: È stato imprudente. Perché l'hai fatto?

translation.en: Why are you smiling? So, you call that a success?
translation.it: Cosa c'è da ridere? Ti pare sia andata bene?
Per un attimo c'è stata intesa.

translation.en: Like, maybe I don't need Veronica.
Well, you need to tell him the truth, though.
translation.it: Ma gli dovrai dire la verità!

translation.en: I'm going to end it tonight.
I'm not going to say nothing.

translation.it: - È un casino tutto tuo, bambola. - Ok.

translation.en: Sorry, I'm just gonna go to the bathroom.
What happened to "You owe him the truth, no matter what?"
translation.it: Che è successo a "gli devo assolutamente dire la verità"?

translation.en: It's funny, your voice sounds skinny again.
translation.it: Strano come la tua voce sia di nuovo delicata.

translation.en: Like on the phone, when I was like, "Oh, your voice was full,"
translation.it: ...quando al telefono ti ho detto della tua "voce piena"

translation.en: you're like, "You calling my voice fat?" And I was like, "No."
translation.it: e tu hai pensato che dicessi "grassa". E io, "no".

translation.en: Ronnie, what are we doing here?
I thought you were trying to get Spence.
He's just some guy I dated forever ago.
translation.it: Un tizio con cui uscivo molto tempo fa.

translation.en: I kissed a boy called Spence once.
translation.it: Una volta ho baciato uno Spence.

translation.en: Have you ever counted shoulders before?
translation.it: Ti mostro come contare le spalle.

translation.en: [Jamey] What, you got a curfew or something?
[Jamey] Why didn't you... Was the movie that bad?
translation.it: Perché non... il film non ti è piaciuto?

translation.en: You look so cold right now.
I'm going to get you a jacket, okay.
[Jamey] I'm kind of obsessed with astronomy.
we look at them from down here
-and they look so beautiful and shiny. -[phone buzzes]
They're actually just made up of hydrogen,
which means that they're just massive balls of gas
translation.it: cioè sono enormi palle di gas

translation.en: floating through space and I think it's trippy.
I wonder if a star knows that it shuns.
translation.it: Mi chiedo se la stella sa di brindare.

translation.en: -If a star knows that it shines. -Yeah, I never thought of that.
translation.it: Se ne è consapevole. Non ci ho mai pensato.

translation.en: Do you know what you wanna be when you grow up?
-Oh, no, not you. -Oh, you should be a singer?
translation.it: - Oh, no, non tu. - Tu volevi essere una cantante?

translation.en: -No, no, no, not me! -You should sing for me.
-I can't sing. It was obviously a joke. -Wait, alright, hold on.
translation.it: - Non so cantare. Scherzavo. - Aspetta un attimo.

translation.en: You want to be a singer, but you don't know how to sing.
translation.it: Volevi essere una cantante, ma non sai cantare.

translation.en: -It was a joke? -It was a joke.
I haven't really thought about life after high school,
translation.it: Non ho ancora pensato a cosa farò dopo le superiori,

translation.en: I literally just met a Sierra.
translation.it: Anche io ho incontrato una Sierra.

translation.en: Not at first. You'd think she was like, a loser, you know.
translation.it: All'inizio penseresti che è una sfigata.

translation.en: -I got really excited. -So you just jumped?
translation.it: - Mi sono emozionata. - E sei saltata?

translation.en: Is that gonna happen every time I try to kiss you, you're gonna jump?
translation.it: Lo farai ogni volta che cercherò di baciarti?

translation.en: Because I have really big pores.
-So can you close your eyes? -I have big pores.
translation.it: - Vuoi chiuderli? - Hai i pori grossi.

translation.en: -Can you close them? -You want me to close my eyes,
translation.it: - Dai, chiudili. - Se vuoi che li chiuda,

translation.en: -my eyes are closed. -Yes. And keep them closed.
translation.it: - li chiuderò. - Sì, e tienili così.

translation.en: My eyes are gonna stay closed until you give me other orders.
translation.it: Li terrò chiusi fino a nuovo ordine.

translation.en: Well, it was worth the wait.
translation.it: Beh, ne è valsa la pena.

translation.en: It's weird, we talked so much on the phone
translation.it: Siamo stati così tanto al telefono

translation.en: it actually feels, like, more normal when I can't see you.
translation.it: che quasi mi sembra più normale non vederti.

translation.en: Keep them closed! I said keep them closed.
Veronica, I just want to see you.
You wanted to see me, now you're not even looking.
translation.it: Che fai ora, neanche mi guardi?

translation.en: -Well, yeah, but I thought I saw some... -What, you saw... what?
translation.it: - Mi pare di aver visto... - Che cosa?

translation.en: You're acting so weird right now.
[Jamey] Am I gonna have to go through that every time I try to kiss you?
translation.it: Sarà sempre così per ogni bacio?

translation.en: If you're crazy, that's just something that I need to know about
-before I take you on a second date. -I'll let you know.
translation.it: - prima del prossimo appuntamento. - Te lo farò sapere.

translation.en: The kind of kiss you read about in books,
translation.it: Il bacio che leggi nei libri
e che pensi non accadrà mai.

translation.en: You wanna hang out and go over our debate platform?
translation.it: Ti va di parlare del nostro dibattito, dopo?

translation.en: I'm just kind of swamped with college stuff right now.
translation.it: Sono piena di roba del college, al momento.

translation.en: Why do people do this to themselves?
translation.it: Perché la gente si tortura così?

translation.en: You should see her prom pictures.
translation.it: Dovresti vedere le foto del ballo.

translation.en: The night of, or the morning after?
translation.it: Della sera o della mattina dopo?

translation.en: -No, I do not need to think about that. -Sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.it: - Non ci voglio pensare. - Hai ragione, scusa.

translation.en: I'm not gonna les out with you and Jamie.
translation.it: Non farò la lesbica in trio con voi.

translation.en: -No, no. -I only do that at parties.
translation.it: - No. - Lo faccio solo alle feste.

translation.en: Why does everybody think I'm a lesbian?
translation.it: Perché tutti pensano che sia lesbica?

translation.en: I wanted to ask, what's up with your mom?
translation.it: Tua madre... cosa c'è che non va?

translation.en: What-- What happened to your dad?
translation.it: E che è successo a tuo padre?

translation.en: And left us with all this crap and furniture and...
translation.it: Ci ha abbandonati con tutti questi mobili di merda e...

translation.en: no way to pay for our old house, and...
she's just been weird about this whole fading youth stuff ever since.
translation.it: ...si è fissata con questa cosa della giovinezza che sfiorisce.

translation.en: You are so tense right now.
Who's ready to get this bitch started? Let's go!
Sorry about that, ladies, sorry about that.
I need to talk to you... now.
Probably ditched your best friend too.
translation.it: Pure tu avrai scaricato il tuo miglior amico.
È pieno di amici di Veronica.
Allora è vero che tutti parlano Mandarino.

translation.en: -Come on wreck, keg stand, now. Let's go! -What?
translation.it: - Dai, befana, la verticale al barile! - Che?

translation.en: [girl] You're such a drama queen now.
translation.it: State facendo un dramma per nulla.

translation.en: Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
If you wanna commit social suicide, fine,
translation.it: Se ti vuoi suicidare socialmente, per me va bene,

translation.en: but Sierra Burgess is a loser.
translation.it: ma Sierra Burgess è una sfigata.

translation.en: Only losers hang out with losers.
translation.it: Solo gli sfigati frequentano altri sfigati.

translation.en: Yo, everyone in here! Everyone in here!
[boy] Come on, everybody gather around! Watch this!
Come on, let's go. Get me up here.
[boy] I told Veronica she's dumb to make her insecure.
translation.it: Ho detto a Veronica che è stupida a sentirsi insicura.

translation.en: I guarantee she puts out tonight.
translation.it: Ti assicuro che stasera me la darà.

translation.en: I bow down to you, sir.
I saw your post and I had to see you.
translation.it: Ho visto il post, volevo incontrarti.

translation.en: What? No, the one about this party.
translation.it: Che? No, il post su questa festa.

translation.en: Do you wanna get out of here?
This place is, like, crawling with dudes.
I can't just ditch my friend.
translation.it: Non posso mollare la mia amica.
Platone credeva che la bellezza fisica...

translation.en: could be in the form of, you know, sensory experience and...
translation.it: ...potesse presentarsi sotto forma di esperienza sensoriale, e...

translation.en: Because you're so good. You're so good.
Do you think you could like me?
really like me, like, not for my...
my stupid looks, or because I'm deaf--
translation.it: ...il mio stupido look o perché sono sorda

translation.en: I need to tell you something,
I don't think I could ever hate you.
No matter what you tell me.
translation.it: A prescindere da quel che mi dirai.

translation.en: What, is it really that bad?
[Sierra's mom] Honey, do you know what kind of kids
translation.it: Tesoro, lo sai quali ragazze vanno alle feste

translation.en: go to a party and get drunk?
Sierra, do you have low self-esteem?
I thought we taught you R-E-S-P-E-C-T.
translation.it: Pensavo ti avessimo insegnato il R-I-S-P-E-T-T-O.
Passione, Etica, Tatto, Talento e Onore.

translation.en: Wait a minute. Before you try to argue your way out of this,
translation.it: Aspetta un attimo. Prima di svicolare via argomentando,

translation.en: which we all know you can do with exceptional talent, you're grounded.
translation.it: cosa per la quale hai un gran talento, sei in punizione.

translation.en: -...talked about this. -No, Jules, you talked about it.
translation.it: - ...ne abbiamo parlato. - No, Jules, tu l'hai fatto.

translation.en: It was some motto that spelled out "free to fly,"
but this is my house too,
translation.it: ma questa è anche casa mia,

translation.en: where there are actions and consequences,
and this little drunk birdie needs her wings clipped.
translation.it: e a questa piccola spugna vanno tarpate le ali.

translation.en: It is not appropriate to ground her.
"We dance on the bar and have a sweet time."
translation.it: "E scattai una foto, sotto il sole feroce."

translation.en: [Ms. T] Inspired, Chrissy. You could co-write for Kesha.
translation.it: Molto ispirata, Chrissy. Potresti collaborare con Kesha.

translation.en: last but not least, our resident progeny of literary greatness,
translation.it: dulcis in fundo, l'erede al trono del regno letterario,

translation.en: What do you mean you forgot?
Are you trying to prove a point?
so much has been going on lately

translation.it: e mi è passato di mente.

translation.en: Well, you know this is going to cost you.
translation.it: Beh, lo sai quanto ti costerà.

translation.en: -And you still have to do the assignment. -[bell rings]
translation.it: E devi comunque fare il compito.

translation.en: I passed out, and I have no idea if I told the truth.
translation.it: Sono svenuta e non ricordo più se gli ho detto la verità.

translation.en: By the time Ronnie called me back, she'd already done it.
translation.it: E per quando Veronica mi ha richiamata, era fatta.

translation.en: I didn't have the heart to tell her the truth.
translation.it: Non ho avuto il fegato di dirle la verità.

translation.en: But I thought y'all wasn't going out last night.
translation.it: Pensavo fossi rimasta a casa, ieri.

translation.en: You told me you wasn't going out.
translation.it: Mi hai detto che non uscivi.

translation.en: -That's why we couldn't hang out. -Okay, well--
translation.it: Per quello non ci siamo visti.

translation.en: -Ronnie, what happened? Are you okay? -He dumped me.
translation.it: - Veronica, tutto ok? - Mi ha scaricato.
Spence mi ha piantato un'altra volta.
- Ma che diavolo? - Non ora, Dan. Ok?

translation.en: And if he doesn't like you for you, then screw him anyway.
translation.it: Se non gli piaci per come sei, che si fotta.

translation.en: This would never have happened if I dated someone like Jamey.
translation.it: Non sarebbe mai successo con uno come Jamey.

translation.en: He's one of the good ones. He's...
translation.it: Lui è uno di quelli buoni. È...

translation.en: Oh, you mean while you were white-girl wasted?
Yeah, I think weird would be an understatement.
translation.it: Sì, credo che "strano" sia un eufemismo.

translation.en: What do you think I think you think I told you?
translation.it: Cosa pensi che io penso di averti detto?

translation.en: What, are you, like, afraid to tell me that you like me or something?
translation.it: Cos'hai, paura di aver confessato che ti piaccio?

translation.en: No, I mean, yeah, no. I don't know.
translation.it: No, cioè... Ecco... Non lo so.

translation.en: Let's just not say it over the phone, okay?
is me not telling you that I like you-like you.
translation.it: sono io che non ti dico quanto mi piaci.

translation.en: -Hi. -I finally get to show you off.
They're kinda the enemy, you know.
Well, you don't wanna be seen fraternizing with the enemy.
translation.it: Oh, non vuoi farti vedere mentre fraternizzi con gli avversari.

translation.en: I think this is gonna be a problem.
-What was that for? -What do you mean? What did I do?
-I gotta go. -Wait, is this about that guy, Spence?
Please tell me you're stupid enough.
♪ Yeah, yeah we got spirit That's right! ♪
translation.it: Yeah yeah siamo forti, già già

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, yeah, we got a what? A what? ♪
Did you just get dissed by the biggest loser in school?
translation.it: Ti fai trattare così dalla più grande sfigata della scuola?

translation.en: ♪ We got a what? A what? ♪
♪ Let's get a little bit rowdy ♪
♪ Let's get a little bit rowdy ♪
♪ Let's get a little bit rowdy ♪
♪ Let's get a little bit rowdy... ♪
Hey, can you do me a favor and yell "Jamey"?
translation.it: Ehi, puoi farmi un favore e strillare "Jamey"?

translation.en: Please, just yell "Jamey" as loud as you can.
translation.it: Per favore, urla "Jamey" più forte che puoi.

translation.en: ♪ Let's get a little bit rowdy... ♪
You moron! That's the wrong team.
Russ, I think kids are smoking pot by the bathrooms again.
translation.it: Russ, stanno di nuovo fumando erba nei bagni.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Go check it out.
[girl About time someone took her down a peg.
translation.it: Era ora che qualcuno le abbassasse la cresta.

translation.en: [girl] Ronnie, Ronnie, where are you going?
-How many fingers am I holding up? -Two.
why did you do this to me? -Wait. Veronica.
-Are you cheating on me with Spence? -No!
Jamey, I'm not. And I'm not who you think I am,
and she's not who you think she is.
She's been pretending to be me and I've been her,
and she's been catfishing you this entire time.
translation.it: e lei ha finto di essere un'altra sin dall'inizio.

translation.en: No, okay, wait. Please, listen to me.
-You have to let me explain, okay, please. -Wait, your voice.
translation.it: - Devi farmi spiegare. - La tua voce.

translation.en: -[coach] Alright, that's enough. -Please, just give me a second.
translation.it: Ok, basta così. Ti prego, solo un secondo.

translation.en: Just stay the hell away from me.
Why did you do this to me?

translation.it: Ti ho vista che lo baciavi.

translation.en: Well, he thinks I'm you, remember? That was the whole plan.
translation.it: Lui pensa che io sia te, no? Come da piano.

translation.en: but you've no idea what it's like to be me.
translation.it: ma non hai idea di cosa voglia dire essere me.

translation.en: I told you things I haven't told anyone.
translation.it: Ti ho confessato cose mai dette a nessuno.

translation.en: because your looks are the least ugly thing about you.
translation.it: perché l'aspetto è l'ultimo dei tuoi problemi.

translation.en: Please tell me that wasn't you.
translation.it: Dimmi che non sei stata tu.

translation.en: I don't even know who you are anymore.
it's easy for you to spout your self-esteem BS,
Do you have any idea what it's like to be a teenage girl and to look like this?
translation.it: Hai la minima idea di cosa significhi essere una teenager con quest'aspetto?

translation.en: Of course not, because you're tiny,
And this is what you stuck me with.
translation.it: E a me mi hai rinchiuso qui dentro.

translation.en: And thus concludes our unit on mitosis.
translation.it: E così abbiamo finito con la mitosi.

translation.en: [Ms. T] I asked for a poem.
I know. I just really wanted to do my own thing.
translation.it: Lo so, è quel che mi sono sentita di fare.

translation.en: Your own thing was also late.
and those are the marks of a true artist.
translation.it: ...e ci riconosco i tratti di una vera artista.

translation.en: And I hope when the time comes,
translation.it: E spero che quando sarà ora,

translation.en: you will allow me to write you a college recommendation.
translation.it: mi lascerai scrivere le referenze per il college.

translation.en: whoever you wrote those words for,
translation.it: la persona per cui l'hai scritta dovrebbe essere informata.

translation.en: you should tell him, or her...
translation.it: la persona per cui l'hai scritta dovrebbe essere informata. Che sia un lui o una lei. Non fa alcuna differenza.
Che sia un lui o una lei. Non fa alcuna differenza.

translation.en: I'm sorry I suck so bad.
Still wanna go to homecoming with me?
translation.it: Vuoi ancora venire al ballo con me?

translation.en: But you should definitely save me a dance, though.
translation.it: Ma dovresti comunque tenermene da parte uno.

translation.en: If that's not too much to ask.
translation.it: Non mi pare di chiederti molto.

translation.en: So, how are you gonna fix this?
Since you're like, the biggest loser in school now or whatever, maybe we can...
translation.it: Dato che ora sei la più grande sfigata della scuola, forse potremmo...
Le rose vanno nei vasi di vetro

translation.en: ♪ Those girls the boys are chasing ♪
♪ Winning all the games they're playing ♪
translation.it: "GIRASOLE" SIERRA BURGESS Che vincono tutte le partite

translation.en: ♪ They're always in a different league ♪
♪ Stretching toward the sky Like I don't care ♪
translation.it: Mi allungo verso il cielo Con indifferenza

translation.en: ♪ Wishing you could see me Standing there ♪
♪ But I'm a sunflower, a little funny ♪
translation.it: Sono un girasole, un po' buffo

translation.en: ♪ If I were a rose, maybe you'd want me ♪
translation.it: Se fossi una rosa Magari mi vorresti

translation.en: ♪ If I could, I'd change overnight ♪
translation.it: E se potessi cambiare Da un giorno all'altro

translation.en: ♪ I'd turn into something you like ♪
translation.it: Mi trasformerei in qualcosa Che ti piace

translation.en: ♪ But I'm a sunflower, a little funny ♪
translation.it: Ma sono un girasole, un po' buffo

translation.en: ♪ If I were a rose, maybe you'd pick me ♪
translation.it: Se fossi una rosa Magari mi coglieresti

translation.en: ♪ But I know you don't have a clue ♪
translation.it: E so che non lo sai
Ma un girasole ti sta aspettando

translation.en: ♪ I'm a sunflower, a little funny ♪
translation.it: Sono un girasole, un po' buffo

translation.en: ♪ And if I were her, maybe you'd pick me ♪
translation.it: Se fossi lei Magari mi sceglieresti

translation.en: ♪ But I know you don't have a clue ♪
translation.it: E so che non lo sai
Ma un girasole ti sta aspettando

translation.en: "Family like this has often a deep sadness in it.
translation.it: "Famiglie come questa spesso nascondono una grande tristezza.

translation.en: knits us together by bone and muscle
translation.it: ci unisce cucendo ossa e muscoli,

translation.en: and divides us by the subtler web of our brains."
translation.it: e ci divide con i sottili fili delle nostre menti."

translation.en: but you are so much more than that.
translation.it: ma sei anche molto di più.

translation.en: it's terrifying growing up under your shadow.

translation.it: Mamma è bella e di successo.

translation.en: I don't know what I am.
So far you're pretty good at finding your own way.
translation.it: Finora sei stata bravissima a trovare la tua strada.

translation.en: You can't bring junk in here.
You don't talk to me like that.
Your father would roll over in his grave.
translation.it: Tuo padre si rivolterebbe nella tomba.

translation.en: I'm sorry for what happened to you.
translation.it: Mi spiace per quel che è stato.

translation.en: And you can't keep living your life like everyone's gonna screw you over.
translation.it: Ma non puoi continuare a vivere come se tutti volessero fregarti.

translation.en: Ironically, home is not where you're supposed to spend homecoming.
translation.it: Il ballo purtroppo non si terrà in questa casa.

translation.en: Yeah, it's the beauty of going stag.
translation.it: Sì, beh, tanto vado da sola.
Mi ha fatto sentire la tua canzone.

translation.en: I had no idea you taught her the Socratic method.
translation.it: Non sapevo le avessi insegnato il metodo socratico.

translation.en: Look, Sierra, what you did was terrible.
translation.it: Senti, quel che hai fatto è terribile.

translation.en: I mean, bad, like, really bad,
But do you ever feel sometimes the world is conspiring against you?
translation.it: Ma non ti sembra che il mondo a volte cospiri contro di te?

translation.en: -To tell you that you're not good enough. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Per dirti che non sei abbastanza. - Sì.

translation.en: I get why you did it, I do, and...
honestly, had we not met the way that we had,
maybe I wouldn't have noticed you.
I mean, you're not exactly everybody's type
translation.it: Cioè, sei un tipo un po' particolare

translation.en: You are exactly my type. I mean,
translation.it: Sei esattamente il mio tipo. Cioè,

translation.en: you're smart and funny and beautiful and talented.
I haven't been that impressed by a voice
translation.it: Nessuna voce mi ha così emozionato

translation.en: on someone who's not famous ever, like, ever.
translation.it: come la tua, neanche una famosa.

translation.en: I think that roses are more like...
translation.it: io credo che le rose siano come...

translation.en: Come on, let's get you to homecoming.
Can you give me one second?
Can you give me a sec?
Okay, you two cannot be best friends without me.
translation.it: Ehi, voi due non potete mica lasciarmi fuori.
